name: A Drunk Thief (IanGoGo)
description:
Play as a drunk thief who breaks into houses to steal objects. The more you have, the harder and the more out of control the thief becomes.

*Production: *A game made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam around the theme "Out of Control"

Credits:
